summary: Flamehazer, the molten greatsword. It's like molten magma on a stick, and looks awesome to boot. This is meant for players like me who have obtained the best items of vanilla Skyrim and want better weapons/armor. It is an end-game weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=orange] Flamehazer[/color][/size]
[size=5][color=orange]The molten greatsword. It's like molten magma on a stick, and looks awesome to boot. [/color][/size]
[size=4] This is meant for players like me who have obtained the best items of vanilla Skyrim and want better weapons/armor.
It is an end-game weapon, and does higher damage than any Daedric. The guards in the screenshots were made immortal to help me showcase the weapon. You can purchase it at the Warmaiden's in Whiterun. I did not have any greatsword positioning mods at the time I took screenshots, so I had my cape and backpack unequipped.[/size][size=1]yes I look nooby :)[/size][size=4]
[color=orange] Flamehazer does high fire damage, and doesn't wear out. The mesh is from the "Riesig Greatsword" in KURESE's Monster Hunter Series Weapons, but now it's a completely new weapon with a new molten enchantment. [/color]
[color=orange] Please give constructive criticism. I will listen to any user suggestions and make modifications appropriately. This is my first uploaded mod. [/color]
[size=5]I am going to add a real flaming effect to it. I just have to find the right one.[/size]
[size=4] I am considering adding a formula for it. Probably the Big Rusty Ore and a boatload of Fire Salts, and two black soulgems. [/size]
Give credit where it is due if you implement or modify my mod and distribute it :)
Should credit KURESE for the mesh.
[color=orange] If you want me to retexture one of your meshes then just ask :D -> I can do retextures of all kinds![/color][/size][size=1]Although I'm not famous D:[/size]
[size=4]My Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19865]Starbomb Spells and Arrow![/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19776]Deadly Telekinesis[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19769]Flamehazer the Molten Greatsword[/url][/size]
author: Richgar
